content: अल्प {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अल्-प] {@--1@} Trifling, unimportant, insignificant (<ab>opp.</ab> महत् or गुरु); <ls>Ms. 11. 36.</ls> {@--2@} Small, little, minute, scanty (<ab>opp.</ab> बहु); अल्पस्य हेतोर्बहु हातुमिच्छन् <ls>R. 2. 47</ls>; <ls n="R.">1. 2</ls>; अल्पकुचांतरा <ls>V. 4. 26.</ls> {@--3@} Mortal, of short existence; अथ यदल्पं तन्मर्त्यं Ch. <ls>Up.</ls> {@--4@} Young. {@--5@} Seldom, rare. --ल्पं Very little. --ल्पं, --ल्पेन, --ल्पात् {%<ab>adv.</ab>%} {@--1@} A little. {@--2@} For a slight reason; प्रीतिरल्पेन भिद्यते <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--3@} Easily, without much trouble or difficulty.
